GisICurveString Class Reference

#include <ICurveString.h>

Inherits GisICurveAbstract.

Inheritance diagram for GisICurveString:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisICurveString class is a CurveString Geometry type. GisICurveString is the most general non-abstract curve type. It is defined by an ordered collection of contiguous curve segments.

Definition at line 33 of file ICurveString.h.
